--- title: Workouts description: Workout routines image: /static/resources/workouts.png execute: echo: false --- ## Intermediate Routines The following regimen can be used for any 5 day/week workout schedule. I typically workout Monday-Friday, where each lift is executed once Monday-Thursday, and any targeted muscle group is performed again on Friday. ### Back & Biceps ::: {.cell execution_count=2} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2}
Lift Sets Reps Notes
Rowerg 1 2-5 minutes Warmup
Deadlift 5 10, 8, 6, 8, 10 Pyramid intensity
Pull-Ups 3 10 Failure on last set
Lat Pull Downs 3 10
One Arm Seated Cable Rows 3 12
Face Pulls 3 12
Bent Over Rows 3 10
Shoulder Superset 3 12 Failure
Hammer Curls 3 12
Barbell Curls 3 12
Back Hyperextension 4 12
Planks 3 60 seconds
Leg Raises 3 15
Sit Ups 3 25
Bike 1 20-30 minutes
::: ::: ### Chest & Triceps ::: {.cell execution_count=3} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3}
Lift Sets Reps Notes
Bench Press 4 10, 8, 5, 3 Pyramid intensity
Incline Press 4 12
Flys 4 12
Dips 3 Failure
Tricep Pushdowns 4 12
Dumbbell Press 4 12
Ab Roller 3 10
Sitting Twists 3 30
Wipers 3 12
Run 1 6 miles
::: ::: ### Legs ::: {.cell execution_count=4} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4}
Lift Sets Reps Notes
Rowerg 1 10 minutes Warmup
Back Squat 5 10, 8, 6, 8, 10 Pyramid intensity
Lunges 3 12
Good Mornings 3 12
Kettelbell Deadlift 3 12
Mixed Cable 3 12 Leg Curl, Side Step, Knee Raise
Back Hyperextension 3 12 Hold for 3 seconds at full extension
Calf Raises 3 12
One Leg Balance 3 45 seconds On Incline
Glute Bridges 3 10
Rowerg 1 5 minutes
::: ::: ### Shoulders & Traps ::: {.cell execution_count=5} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5}
Lift Sets Reps Comments
Rowerg 1.0 10 minutes Warmup
Military Press 4.0 12, 8, 5, 3 Failure On Last Set
Lateral Raises 3.0 12
Rear Delt Flys 3.0 12
Front Raises 3.0 10
Dumbell Superset
Barbell Shrugs 3.0 10
One Arm Dumbbell Snatch 3.0 10
Upright Rows 3.0 10
Kettlebell Swing 3.0 10
Farmers Carry 3.0 Failure
Scissor Kicks 3.0 30 seconds
L-sit 3.0 Failure
Toe Taps 3.0 20
::: ::: ## Introductory Routines ### Intro to Push ::: {.cell execution_count=6} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6}
Lift Sets Reps How-To
Dumbbell Bench Press 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/dumbbell-bench-press/)
Dumbell Incline Press 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/incline-dumbbell-bench-press/)
Dumbbell Flys 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/dumbbell-fly/)
Lateral Raises 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/cable-one-arm-lateral-raise/)
Front Raises 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/seated-dumbbell-front-raise/)
Tricep Push Down 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/triceps-push-down/)
Planks 3 Failure [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/front-plank/)
Sit-ups 3 12 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/sit-up/)
Leg Raises 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/seated-knee-raise/)
::: ::: ### Intro to Pull ::: {.cell execution_count=7} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7}
Lift Sets Reps How-To
Cable Rows 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/straight-back-seated-cable-row/)
Dumbbell Rows 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/bent-over-dumbbell-row/)
Upright Rows 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/dumbbell-wide-grip-upright-row/)
Dumbbell Curls 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/seated-alternating-dumbbell-curl/)
Hammer Curls 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/dumbbell-hammer-curl/)
Farmer Carry 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/dumbbell-farmers-walk/)
::: ::: ### Intro to Legs ::: {.cell execution_count=8} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8}
Lift Sets Reps How-To
Kettlebell Deadlift 4 10, 8, 5, 3 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/barbell-deadlift/)
Half Squat 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/dumbbell-squat/)
Calf Raises 3 12 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/standing-dumbbell-one-leg-calf-raise/)
1 leg balance 3 30 sec
Back Hyperextension 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/hyperextension/)
Bird Dog 3 10 [View](https://www.verywellfit.com/how-to-do-the-bird-dog-exercise-3498253)
